Sex club SNCTM boasts locations from sun-drenched California to Moscow, and is the most exclusive and elitist institution of its type.

The members only club hosts wild sex parties for the wealthy and the famous, and only admits guests after a rigorous application process.

The process involves giving full names, jobs and dates of birth, but also disclose their sexual fantasies so that club bosses can cater to their desries.

The next stage is uploading snaps, and those attractive enough will be granted entrance.

The club's bosses revealed to the Star Online that their club is in high demand among the high and mighty.

(Image: SNCTM)

They dished: "SNCTM is known as the most elite sex club in the world because of the unique nature of our attendees and the quality of our events.

"We are extremely selective in the guests we approve to attend.

"Our average member is very high net worth, a prominent person in their industry, and aligned with our ethos of the sexual libertine.

"We cater to guests with extremely refined tastes and therefore we ensure that every element of our soirees are of the highest calibre."

(Image: SNCTM)

(Image: SNCTM)

The biggest celeb names can get on the guest list free of charge, or women deemed attractive enough.

For the majority of men, though, it costs upward of a whopping £2,000 for entry.

Membership is heavy on the wallet too, and party-goers who want entry to the club's private rooms would be set back £60,000 per year.

The bosses continued: "Guests arrive at the clandestine location in tuxedos and evening wear. A mask is donned for entry.

"Our security staff clears the guests to enter and a door is pulled open into a world that few will ever see.

(Image: SNCTM)

"At a recent masquerade, guests entered into the Grand Foyer of a large private residence .

"Three of our devotees were locked in sexual congress on an altar covered in furs.

"A butler provided our guests with champagne and they were free to wander the premises and enjoy the company of both guests and devotees.

Photography is strictly banned, and consent is emphasised.

A spokesperson said: "The golden rule of SNCTM is consent - we always ask before we touch.

"Anyone who violates this rule will be removed by security and banned from SNCTM."
description: The club SNCTM, which has spots all over the globe, has an extremely exclusive guest list as it caters to the rich and famous
